thread.title: Maher Tells Democrats Not to Give In on Gorsuch: ‘The Supreme Court Pick Was Stolen’
thread.title_full: Maher Tells Democrats Not to Give In on Gorsuch: ‘The Supreme Court Pick Was Stolen’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Maher Tells Democrats Not to Give In on Gorsuch: ‘The Supreme Court Pick Was Stolen’
text:
Maher Tells Democrats Not to Give In on Gorsuch: ‘The Supreme Court Pick Was Stolen’ by Josh Feldman | 10:59   
Bill Maher tonight said that Democrats should “stop bringing a knife to a gun fight” and get tougher in pushing back on President Trump ‘s Supreme Court pick. 
Because as far as Maher’s concerned, “the Supreme Court pick was stolen… The only person I would accept is Merrick Garland .” 
Trump this week nominated Neil Gorsuch to the Supreme Court to widespread conservative acclaim. 
Watch above, via HBO.
